channel.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
channel.description:
NOTE - '>' denotes I was on my phone typing it out at that time. This is exactly how my logs were typed so I'll keep it this way. I realize I posted logs quite often, But I don't care at all. I posted whenever I felt a change or something funny occurring.
8:40 - drank half of the 120ml bottle 8:55 - feeling 'funny' 9:01 - drank half of the rest 9:32 - weird and dizzy 9:34 - drank some moororewtf is wag 9:48 - head feels realllyyyy heavy 9:49 - shits feeling slow eating popcorn felt this was necessary to note 9:54 - stomach growled wtf 9:57 - chest is aggrevating, itchy... started singing what is love rofl m 10:00 - drank the rest 10:01 - im in love with juice, neck and eyes feel weird..cool sensation on shoulders 10:03 shits gettin bvlurry 10:08 - getting really hot taking shirt off nts: yelling while itchy doesnt help http://www.cakenet.net/tripout/ 10:23 - ran home took the biggest wettest shit possbile feel really dizzy 10:28 - really zdizyzy onna take of fjeans wobbly while astanding stomach mumbling some words or some shit 10:30 -= painfully itchy 10:32 -failed at texting, drooled somehjow 10:32-10:36 - layed in my 'cool' sheets scratching my back vigorously until ya that time n talkin to some girl l0l0l 10:37 - head is insanely itchy LIKE BUGS ARE CRAWLING IN IT WTF I HAVE STO SCRATCH IT OMFG 10:40 - scratching everywhere feels nice now 10:42 0 -gonna go take a bath i feel like im shaking woah brb > 10:46 Back is pure red full of scratches > 10: in bath because > 10:51 got a good head high now tho i'm writing this on my cell and txting while chillin. Ouch my back just started burning because of the warm water i'm gonna try n chill for a bit > 10:59 seems like i can control the itch now. Hurts still. > 11:02 i feel pretty good now gonna get out of this damn thing soon. It's awesome. I move my head anywhere and still focus on this one spot. Great sensation > 11:06 My mind is at peace now 11:14 - i got out of the bathtub... apparently that was my euphoria. i began drying myself off, and i couldn't stop.. faster, harder, faster, harder... threw the towel and started scratching at my legs. realized what i was doing so i tried as best as i can to finish drying off and walked to my room, while walking.. noticed my legs werent bending. huh. scratching my feet now during the time of typing this out.. `11:23 - gonna go lay down.. might take more logs in my phone again while watching seinfeld > 11:27 went to fart and realized it's not the best idea as i may shart. Scratching alot until i started typing this. Good. Txting some hoe :) 11:30 - gonna poop > 11:34 hallucinate when i poop wait Wtf lol > 11:36 head is now insanely itchy. Update: head is now fine 11:42 - head feels nice 11:46 - i feel great right now.. 11:49 - i post logs often lol.. i was itchy just now but i wasnt then i was then i wasn't then my foot got itchy then im ok > 11:51 time is passing fast. Evert time i go to my bed i feel a great dizzy feeling. Slightly itchy right arm 11:58 - put on supremacy.mp3 ... fucking woah. waiting forit to fucking woahit hy legs btw > 12:01 the song made me feel good while watching family guy > 12:04 watching lois on family guy steal stuff made my lower back itchy lol.. Why is it always about being itchy. Head feels awesome tho > 12:11 trip is gone i think. Moving my head still feels great. I has a slight tingly feeling
All in all, apart from the itching.. It was pretty good. I will consider doing it again at a higher dosage since it's on sale. :D Surprisingly.. I wasn't feeling much until I drank the last bit of the bottle. Right then, I immediately left my friends house from playing RE5 and eating popcorn. (Duration between 10:08-10:23) Thanks to the guys on irc, c|p jme_009 Imk0tter Rictoo_ pwnd_

Reminds me of my freon days.

item.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

We are probably more educated on the health risks than you are. We choose to use the drugs anyways. The benefits outweigh the risks for me.

We don’t tell you to do drugs, so don’t tell us to stop. If people don’t stop for their parents or the laws, they are not going to stop because of some kid on a forum. Although I know your intentions are good.

Read full topic

item.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Can you link me to a tut on how to extract the DXM?

And yes, next time I will indeed use Marijuana with it.

Read full topic

item.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah if you liked it try a higher dose next time. But remember the negative side effects will increase. Maybe you want to consider extracting the dxm.

For itchyness, take a medical dose of diphenhydramine or dimenhydrinate when you dose. This will also help combat against nausea as well. Marijuana will greatly increase the dissociative effects of DXM and lower the negative effects. I strongly recommend it.

EhPrettyEasy didn’t quite have the same good time when he did it that day

Read full topic

item.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

omg i had that itching feeling too. I had the worst case of sausage fingers and felt hammered.

I went to the loop in Mass and because of all the snow, the snow plowers plowed until there was a giant hill that reached a height over the movie theater. My friend and I decided to climb it, I was the first up, and when I was there, I felt like Rocky and just started jumping and punching the air. Fun day.

Read full topic

item.title: My DXM Trip [Logs]
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

NOTE - ‘>’ denotes I was on my phone typing it out at that time. This is exactly how my logs were typed so I’ll keep it this way. I realize I posted logs quite often, But I don’t care at all. I posted whenever I felt a change or something funny occurring.

8:40 - drank half of the 120ml bottle 8:55 - feeling 'funny' 9:01 - drank half of the rest 9:32 - weird and dizzy 9:34 - drank some moororewtf is wag 9:48 - head feels realllyyyy heavy 9:49 - shits feeling slow eating popcorn felt this was necessary to note 9:54 - stomach growled wtf 9:57 - chest is aggrevating, itchy... started singing what is love rofl m 10:00 - drank the rest 10:01 - im in love with juice, neck and eyes feel weird..cool sensation on shoulders 10:03 shits gettin bvlurry 10:08 - getting really hot taking shirt off nts: yelling while itchy doesnt help

http://www.cakenet.net/tripout/

10:23 - ran home took the biggest wettest shit possbile
feel really dizzy
10:28 - really zdizyzy onna take of fjeans
wobbly while astanding stomach mumbling some words or some shit
10:30 -= painfully itchy
10:32 -failed at texting, drooled somehjow
10:32-10:36 - layed in my ‘cool’ sheets scratching my back vigorously until ya that time n talkin to some girl l0l0l
10:37 - head is insanely itchy LIKE BUGS ARE CRAWLING IN IT WTF I HAVE STO SCRATCH IT OMFG
10:40 - scratching everywhere feels nice now
10:42 0 -gonna go take a bath i feel like im shaking woah brb

10:46 Back is pure red full of scratches
10: in bath because
10:51 got a good head high now tho i’m writing this on my cell and txting while chillin. Ouch my back just started burning because of the warm water i’m gonna try n chill for a bit
10:59 seems like i can control the itch now. Hurts still.
11:02 i feel pretty good now gonna get out of this damn thing soon. It’s awesome. I move my head anywhere and still focus on this one spot. Great sensation
11:06 My mind is at peace now
11:14 - i got out of the bathtub… apparently that was my euphoria. i began drying myself off, and i couldn’t stop… faster, harder, faster, harder… threw the towel and started scratching at my legs. realized what i was doing so i tried as best as i can to finish drying off and walked to my room, while walking… noticed my legs werent bending. huh. scratching my feet now during the time of typing this out…
`11:23 - gonna go lay down… might take more logs in my phone again while watching seinfeld
11:27 went to fart and realized it’s not the best idea as i may shart. Scratching alot until i started typing this. Good. Txting some hoe
11:30 - gonna poop
11:34 hallucinate when i poop wait Wtf lol
11:36 head is now insanely itchy. Update: head is now fine
11:42 - head feels nice
11:46 - i feel great right now…
11:49 - i post logs often lol… i was itchy just now but i wasnt then i was then i wasn’t then my foot got itchy then im ok
11:51 time is passing fast. Evert time i go to my bed i feel a great dizzy feeling. Slightly itchy right arm
11:58 - put on supremacy.mp3 … fucking woah. waiting forit to
fucking woahit hy legs btw
12:01 the song made me feel good while watching family guy
12:04 watching lois on family guy steal stuff made my lower back itchy lol… Why is it always about being itchy. Head feels awesome tho
12:11 trip is gone i think. Moving my head still feels great. I has a slight tingly feeling

All in all, apart from the itching… It was pretty good. I will consider doing it again at a higher dosage since it’s on sale.

Surprisingly… I wasn’t feeling much until I drank the last bit of the bottle. Right then, I immediately left my friends house from playing RE5 and eating popcorn. (Duration between 10:08-10:23)

Thanks to the guys on irc,
c|p jme_009 Imk0tter Rictoo_ pwnd_

Read full topic
